ThingDef.label: human implant: spider limbs
ThingDef.description: Four spider "arms". Not quite usable in combat, but a great help in moving around and handling items.

ThingDef.label: human implant: spinneret
ThingDef.description: Spider silk producing organ. On a human. Try not to think where it's coming from.

ThingDef.label: human implant: equine "love enhancer"
ThingDef.description: Equine "love enhancer". You know what's up, don't you?
